Skills¶

Skill¶

class scripts.skills.skill.Skill(owner, skill_tree_name, skill_name)[source]¶

A skill to be used by an actor

name¶
Type

str

owner¶
skill_tree_name¶
use(target_direction)[source]¶

Use the skill

Parameters

target_direction (tuple) – x y of the target direction

Affliction¶

class scripts.skills.affliction.Affliction(affliction_name, duration, affected_entity)[source]¶

Affliction, either Bane or Boon. Applies a periodic effect to an Entity, dictated by its AfflictionTrigger.

name¶

string name of the Affliction

Type

str

description¶

description of the Affliction

Type

str

icon¶

pygame image to symbolise the Affliction

Type

pygame.Image

affliction_category¶

Bane or Boon

Type

AfflictionCategory

duration¶

amount of applications before expiry

Type

int

trigger_event¶

the event that triggers the Affliction to activate

Type

AfflictionTriggers

affected_entity¶

the Entity being impacted by the Affliction

Type

Entity

affliction_effects¶

list of AfflictionEffects

Type

list(AfflictionEffect)

trigger()[source]¶

Trigger all afflictions effects and decrement duration by 1 (Except for Permanent). Duration reduced at end of turn.
